snippet: Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley agreed on Wednesday to a $557 million settlement with regulators over their mortgage lending and foreclosure practices, building on an earlier deal with big banks.
abstract: Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley agreed on Wednesday to a $557 million settlement with regulators over their mortgage lending and foreclosure practices, building on an earlier deal with big banks.

headline.main: 2 Banks to Pay $557 Million in Foreclosure Settlement
headline.print_headline: 2 Banks to Pay $557 Million In Foreclosure Settlement
